Introduction
============

Motivation
**********

Nand2Tetris provides all the materials and tools necessary for building a general-purpose computer system and a modern software hierarchy from the ground up.

The materials are aimed at students, instructors, and self-learners.

Additional
**********

Nand to Tetris courses are taught at 400+ universities, high schools, and bootcamps. The students who take them range from high schoolers to Ph.D. students to Google engineers. Here is the extended course syllabus.


.. warning::

   This is a warning

   This is a note

    caution text maybe
